content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- Check for duplicates in the taxi zone data

SELECT location_id,
COUNT(1) AS number_of_records
FROM 
   OPENROWSET (
            BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'csv',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
            FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
        )
WITH (
     location_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)AS[result]
GROUP BY location_id
HAVING COUNT(1) > 1

SELECT borough,
COUNT(1) AS number_of_records
FROM 
   OPENROWSET (
            BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'csv',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
            FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
        )
WITH (
     location_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)AS[result]
GROUP BY borough
HAVING COUNT(1) > 1
